title: A passenger aircraft that flies around the world at Mach 9? Sure, why not
summary: “How much does the world change if you can get anywhere in an hour?”

title: Japan delays H2A launch in the wake of H3 failure
summary: Japan has delayed the launch of a H-2A rocket planned for May to no earlier than August in the wake of the failed inaugural flight of H3 rocket.

title: China’s Space Pioneer reaches orbit with liquid propellent rocket
summary: Space Pioneer has become the first Chinese private launch firm to achieve orbit with a liquid propellant rocket.

title: China’s Space Pioneer reaches orbit with liquid propellant rocket
summary: Space Pioneer has become the first Chinese private launch firm to achieve orbit with a liquid propellant rocket.

title: NASA policy discourages naming missions after individuals
summary: A new NASA policy makes it unlikely future missions will be named after individuals in response to the controversy surrounding the naming of the James Webb Space Telescope.
